title: Item Server Definition
description: The minecraft item server definition file, defining a item's behavior.

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A common format version allowing a non-wildcards semver.

states.title: associative container (class std::map<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >,struct Puv::v1_20_50::BlockDescriptor::Compound,struct std::less<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > >,class std::allocator<struct std::pair<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > const ,struct Puv::v1_20_50::BlockDescriptor::Compound> > >)

I.title: minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative
I.description: The can_destroy_in_creative component determines if the item can be used by a player to break blocks when in creative mode.

value.description: Determines whether the item can be used to destroy blocks while in creative mode.

J.title: minecraft:max_stack_size
J.description: The max_stack_size component specifies how many of the item can be stacked together.

value.description: Specifies how many of the item that can be stacked.

BA.title: minecraft:hover_text_color
BA.description: The hover_text_color component specifies the color of the item name when the players hovers the cursor over the item.

value.description: Specifies the color of the item's hover text.

BB.title: minecraft:stacked_by_data
BB.description: The stacked_by_data component determines whether the same items with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item entities can merge while floating in the world.

value.description: Determines whether the same item with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item entities can merge while floating in the world.

BC.title: minecraft:hand_equipped
BC.description: The hand_equipped component determines if an item is rendered like a tool while it is in a player's hand.

value.description: Determines whether the item is rendered like a tool while in the player's hand.

BD.title: minecraft:liquid_clipped
BD.description: The liquid_clipped component determines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

value.description: Deterines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

BE.title: minecraft:allow_off_hand
BE.description: The allow_off_hand component determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot of the inventory.

value.description: Determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot.

BF.title: minecraft:damage
BF.description: The damage component determines how much extra damage the item does on attack.

value.description: Specifies how much extra damage the item does, must be a positive number.

BG.title: minecraft:should_despawn
BG.description: Should_despawn component determines if the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

value.description: Determines whether the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world.

BH.title: minecraft:use_animation
BH.description: Use_animation specifies which animation is played when the player uses the item.

value.title: enum Puv::Legacy::UseAnimation
value.description: Specifies which animation to play when the the item is used.

BJ.title: minecraft:use_modifiers
BJ.description: This component modifies use effects, including how long the item takes to use and the player's speed when used in combination with components like "shooter", "throwable", or "food".

movement_modifier.description: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.

use_duration.description: How long the item takes to use in seconds.

CC.title: minecraft:enchantable
CC.description: The enchantable component specifies what enchantments can be applied to the item. Not all enchantments will have an effect on all item components.

slot.description: Specifies which types of enchantments can be applied. For example, `bow` would allow this item to be enchanted as if it were a bow.

value.description: Specifies the value of the enchantment (minimum of 0).

CG.title: minecraft:glint
CG.description: The glint component determines whether the item has the enchanted glint render effect on it.

value.description: Determines whether the item has the glint effect.

CH.title: minecraft:interact_button
CH.description: This component is a boolean or string that determines if the interact button is shown in touch controls and what text is displayed on the button. When set as true, default "Use Item" text will be displayed.

CI.title: minecraft:icon
CI.description: Icon item component determines which icon graphic will be used to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.

texture.description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file.

textures.title: associative container (class std::unordered_map<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >,class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >,struct std::hash<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > >,struct std::equal_to<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > >,class std::allocator<struct std::pair<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > const ,class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > > > >)
textures.description: This map contains the different textures that can be used for the item's icon. Default will contain the actual icon texture. Armor trim textures and palettes can be specified here too. The icon textures are the keys from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file.

textures.title: associative container (class std::unordered_map<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >,class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >,struct std::hash<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > >,struct std::equal_to<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > >,class std::allocator<struct std::pair<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > const ,class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > > > >)
textures.description: This map contains the different textures that can be used for the item's icon. Default will contain the actual icon texture. Armor trim textures and palettes can be specified here too. The icon textures are the keys from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file.

default.description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file.

DA.title: minecraft:item_storage
DA.description: The Storage Item Component is used for storing Items within an Item's User Data

capacity.description: The max capacity of the item. Default is 64

DB.description: Event trigger for when the item has completed its use duration.

on_complete.description: Event trigger for when the item has completed its use duration.

movement_modifier.description: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.

DE.title: minecraft:cooldown
DE.description: After you use an item, all items specified with the same `cool down category` setting becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.

category.description: The type of cool down for this item. All items with a cool down component with the same category are put on cool down when one is used.

duration.description: The duration of time (in seconds) items with a matching category will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.

DF.title: minecraft:durability
DF.description: The durability item component specifies how much damage the item takes before breaking, and allows the item to be combined to repair or augment them.

damage_chance.description: Specifies the percentage chance of this item losing durability. Default is set to 100. Defined as an int range with min and max value.

max_durability.description: Max durability is the amount of damage that this item can take before breaking. This is a required parameter and has a minimum of 0.

speed.description: Digging speed for the correlating block(s).

DH.title: minecraft:digger
DH.description: Digger item component specifies how quickly this item can dig specific blocks.

destroy_speeds.title: sequence container (class std::vector<struct Puv::v1_20_50::DiggerItemComponent::BlockInfo,class std::allocator<struct Puv::v1_20_50::DiggerItemComponent::BlockInfo> >)
destroy_speeds.description: A list of blocks to dig with correlating speeds of digging.

use_efficiency.description: Determines whether this item should be impacted if the efficiency enchantment is applied to it.

on_consume.description: Event trigger for when the item is consumed.

DI.title: minecraft:display_name
DI.description: The display_name item component specifies the text shown whenever an item's name is displayed, like in hover text.

DJ.title: minecraft:entity_placer
DJ.description: The entity_placer item component specifies the blocks that the item can be placed on.

dispense_on.title: sequence container (class std::vector<struct Puv::v1_20_50::BlockDescriptor,class std::allocator<struct Puv::v1_20_50::BlockDescriptor> >)
dispense_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

entity.description: The entity to be placed in the world.

use_on.title: sequence container (class std::vector<struct Puv::v1_20_50::BlockDescriptor,class std::allocator<struct Puv::v1_20_50::BlockDescriptor> >)
use_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

oneOf.title: associative container (class std::map<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >,class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >,struct std::less<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > >,class std::allocator<struct std::pair<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > const ,class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > > > >)

EA.title: minecraft:food
EA.description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player. Must have the 'minecraft:use_duration' component in order to function properly.

can_always_eat.description: If true you can always eat this item (even when not hungry). Default is set to false.

nutrition.description: Value that is added to the entity's nutrition when the item is used. Default is set to 0.

oneOf.description: saturation_modifier is used in this formula: (nutrition * saturation_modifier * 2) when applying the saturation buff. Default is set to 0.6.

using_converts_to.description: When used, converts to the item specified by the string in this field. Default does not convert item.

on_consume.description: Event trigger for when the item is consumed.

EC.title: minecraft:fuel
EC.description: Fuel item component allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.

duration.description: Amount of time, in seconds, this fuel will cook items.

EF.title: minecraft:block_placer
EF.description: Items with the block_placer component will place a block when used.

block.description: Defines the block that will be placed.

use_on.title: sequence container (class std::vector<struct Puv::v1_20_50::BlockDescriptor,class std::allocator<struct Puv::v1_20_50::BlockDescriptor> >)
use_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

EG.title: minecraft:projectile
EG.description: Projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.

minimum_critical_power.description: Specifies how long a player must charge a projectile for it to critically hit.

projectile_entity.description: Which entity is to be fired as a projectile.

oneOf.title: sequence container (class std::vector<struct Puv::Legacy::ItemDescriptor,class std::allocator<struct Puv::Legacy::ItemDescriptor> >)

items.title: sequence container (class std::vector<struct Puv::Legacy::ItemDescriptor,class std::allocator<struct Puv::Legacy::ItemDescriptor> >)
items.description: Items that may be used to repair an item.

repair_amount.description: How much the item is repaired.

EH.title: minecraft:repairable
EH.description: The repairable item component specifies which items can be used to repair this item, along with how much durability is gained.

repair_items.title: sequence container (class std::vector<struct Puv::v1_20_50::RepairableItemComponent::RepairItemEntry,class std::allocator<struct Puv::v1_20_50::RepairableItemComponent::RepairItemEntry> >)
repair_items.description: List of repair item entries. Each entry needs to define a list of strings for `items` that can be used for the repair and an optional `repair_amount` for how much durability is gained.

search_inventory.description: Can search inventory? Default is set to false.

use_in_creative.description: Can use in creative mode? Default is set to false.

use_offhand.description: Can use off-hand? Default is set to false.

charge_on_draw.description: Charge on draw? Default is set to false.

max_draw_duration.description: Draw Duration. Default is set to 0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Scale power by draw duration? Default is set to false.

EJ.title: minecraft:throwable
EJ.description: Throwable items can be thrown by the player, such as a snowball.

default_offset_scale.description: The scale at which the throw position is adjusted by the aim direction.

do_swing_animation.description: Determines whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown. Default is set to false.

inside_block_offset_scale.description: The scale at which the throw position is adjusted by the aim direction if the default throw position is inside a solid block.

launch_power_scale.description: The scale at which the power of the throw increases. Default is set to 1.0.

max_draw_duration.description: The maximum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

max_launch_power.description: The maximum power to launch the throwable item. Default is set to 1.0.

min_draw_duration.description: The minimum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. Default is set to false.

FA.description: Weapon Item Component. Added to every weapon item such as axe, sword, trident, bow, crossbow.

on_hurt_entity.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hurt another mob

on_not_hurt_entity.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item hit another actor, but didn't do damage

on_hit_block.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hit a block

FB.title: minecraft:wearable
FB.description: Wearable items can be worn by a player in the head, chest, legs, feet, or off-hand slots.

protection.description: How much protection the wearable item provides. Default is set to 0.

slot.title: enum Puv::Legacy::EquipmentSlot
slot.description: Specifies where the item can be worn. If any non-hand slot is chosen, the max stack size is set to 1.

FC.title: minecraft:record
FC.description: Record Item Component. Used by record items to play music.

comparator_signal.description: Specifies signal strength for comparator blocks to use, from 1 - 13.

duration.description: Specifies duration of sound event in seconds, float value.

sound_event.title: enum Puv::Legacy::LevelSoundEvent
sound_event.description: Sound event type: 13, cat, blocks, chirp, far, mall, mellohi, stal, strad, ward, 11, wait, pigstep, otherside, 5, relic.

FD.title: minecraft:custom_components
FD.description: Specifies an array of custom components defined in a script that should be added to this item.

FE.title: minecraft:tags
FE.description: The tags component specifies which tags an item has on it.

tags.title: sequence container (class std::vector<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >,class std::allocator<class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > > >)
tags.description: An array that can contain multiple item tags.

FF.description: 设置物品拿在手上时是否显示.

FG.description: 设置物品是否防火，防火的物品会与下界合金一样，不会被火烧毁，掉进岩浆时会弹走.

FH.description: 设置物品是否可以放在副手。副手物品不支持一些其他组件，如minecraft:foil，netease:render_offsets。

FI.description: 设置物品是否可以当附魔材料。

FJ.description: 可燃类物品组件。允许该物品作为燃料在熔炉中燃烧。

duration.description: 可填， 该物品可提供的熔炉燃烧时长（秒）。
可填，这个物品能够再次使用前的冷却时间。

B.title: `minecraft:item` Object
B.description: The main area to define an item.

custom_item_type.description: 我的世界中国版自定义物品类别，请勿在国际版上使用。

register_to_create_menu.description: 是否注册到创造栏。我的世界中国版自定义物品注册属性，请勿在国际版上使用。
